title: UAE envoy calls on interior minister
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 10 (APP):Federal Minister for Interior Brig (R) Ijaz Ahmad Shah Monday met with Ambassador of United Arab Emirates (UAE) Hamad Obaid Alzaabi and discussed bilateral and mutual areas of interest.
The interior minister said people to people contact would have been more stronger if there had no language barrier between the people of the two countries.
The ambassador said the UAE government has formulated a policy to send back imprisoned Pakistanis.
He also thanked the minister for extending support from the interior ministry regarding relevant matters.
The minister said we were trying our best to facilitate in every possible way.
The both the countries would continue to work for the betterment of bilateral ties, the press release further said.
